column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm a sucker for pizza. After a long day walking around downtown
column2: we ended up at Lou's for an early dinner. Though it was near the dinner rush
column3: we were seated almost immediately. We split an individual house salad and a small order of The Lou deep dish. I enjoyed a beer during the wait
column4: and was kind of surprised to see they only had Goose Island products on tap. Seems rather paltry for a pizza place.
